TopicTitle: Old mods for the latest KSP?

Articles.Content: How can people get these old but useful mods running in latest KSP? And mods like hanger grid etc?

You either wait for the developers of said mods to update them when they feel like it, or you right click on the game in your Steam library, go to properties, then the betas tab and roll back to an earlier version of the game that works with the mods you want.

Rolling back to an earlier version may not work with save games that were opened in the later version. (At least that happened to me)

If you roll back the game I would also turn off auto updates for the game and not launch the game from Steam.

You have to use either KSP.exe or KSP_64.exe if you are using 64bit windows....or a short cut to one of those exes...

Make sure you download mods that match the version of the game you pick...
